languages.text: {n}Атилиус кривится, нервно поглядывая по сторонам.{/n} "Новое {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarGovern}руководство{/d} колонией издало несколько... необычных декретов. Нам пришлось потратить уйму ресурсов на перенос агрокомплексов и хранилищ из так называемой "запретной лесной зоны Л-Тан". И к нам регулярно приходят доносы разной степени бестолковости, объединенные, впрочем, одной темой — обвинениями руководящих лиц в связи с... посторонними элементами. От лесных духов, до, храни Император, агентов ксеносов".

traits.locale_text: {n}Атилиус кривится, нервно поглядывая по сторонам.{/n} "Враги чел... В смысле уважаемый Муаран и его свита не сильно тревожат мирных жителей. Однако нам пришлось потратить уйму ресурсов на перенос агрокомплексов и хранилищ из так называемых "священных лесов Лилэтан".

languages.text: {n}Atilius winces, his eyes nervously darting around.{/n} "The new colony {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarGovern}leadership{/d} issued a number of... irregular decrees. We have been obliged to spend prodigious amounts of resources to relocate agri-complexes and warehouses from the so-called 'L-Than Restricted Forest Area.' We also regularly receive denunciations of various degrees of nonsensicality, all of which share a common theme: they all accuse the people in charge of having ties to... foreign elements. From forest spirits to, Emperor preserve us, agents of xenos."
languages.original_text: {n}Атилиус кривится, нервно поглядывая по сторонам.{/n} "Новое {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarGovern}руководство{/d} колонией издало несколько... необычных декретов. Нам пришлось потратить уйму ресурсов на перенос агрокомплексов и хранилищ из так называемой "запретной лесной зоны Л-Тан". И к нам регулярно приходят доносы разной степени бестолковости, объединенные, впрочем, одной темой — обвинениями руководящих лиц в связи с... посторонними элементами. От лесных духов, до, храни Император, агентов ксеносов".

traits.locale_text: {n}Atilius winces, his eyes nervously darting around.{/n} "The new colony leadership issued a number of... irregular decrees. We have been obliged to spend prodigious amounts of resources to relocate agri-complexes and warehouses from the so-called 'Restricted Forest Area L-Than.' We also regularly receive denunciations of various degrees of nonsensicalness, all of which share a common theme: they all accuse the people in charge of having ties to... foreign elements. From forest spirits to, Emperor preserve us, agents of xenos."

languages.text: {n}阿蒂利乌斯脸上的肌肉抽搐着，紧张地四处打量起来。{/n}“殖民地{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarGovern}新的领导层{/d}颁布了许多……不合规的法令，我们不得不花费大量资源，将许多综合农业中心与仓库从所谓的‘莉莱赞的圣林’中迁出来。此外，我们还经常收到各种各样的胡言乱语，这所有的无稽之谈说的都是同样的事情。那些人指控殖民地的管理层与……异界因素有所瓜葛。有人说，他们的同谋是森林中的精怪，还有人说……愿帝皇保佑我们，是异形的代理人。”
languages.original_text: {n}Atilius winces, his eyes nervously darting around.{/n} "The new colony {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarGovern}leadership{/d} issued a number of... irregular decrees. We have been obliged to spend prodigious amounts of resources to relocate agri-complexes and warehouses from the so-called 'L-Than Restricted Forest Area.' We also regularly receive denunciations of various degrees of nonsensicality, all of which share a common theme: they all accuse the people in charge of having ties to... foreign elements. From forest spirits to, Emperor preserve us, agents of xenos."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿蒂利乌斯脸上的肌肉抽搐着，紧张地四处打量起来。{/n}“人类之敌——我是说，尊贵的穆兰与他的随从并没有在平民百姓中造成过度恐慌。不过，我们不得不花费大量资源，将许多综合农业中心与仓库从所谓的‘莉莱赞的圣林’中迁出来。”

languages.text: {n}Atilius hace una mueca y mueve los ojos de un lado a otro, inquieto.{/n} «Los nuevos {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarGovern}líderes{/d} de la colonia han emitido una serie de decretos... irregulares. Nos hemos visto forzados a invertir una cantidad prodigiosa de recursos en la reubicación de complejos agrícolas y almacenes de la llamada "área forestal restringida L-Than". También recibimos acusaciones regulares, algunas con más sentido que otras, de que las altas esferas tienen vínculos con... elementos ajenos. De espíritus del bosque a, que el Emperador nos guarde, agentes de los xenos».
languages.original_text: {n}Atilius winces, his eyes nervously darting around.{/n} "The new colony {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarGovern}leadership{/d} issued a number of... irregular decrees. We have been obliged to spend prodigious amounts of resources to relocate agri-complexes and warehouses from the so-called 'L-Than Restricted Forest Area.' We also regularly receive denunciations of various degrees of nonsensicality, all of which share a common theme: they all accuse the people in charge of having ties to... foreign elements. From forest spirits to, Emperor preserve us, agents of xenos."

traits.locale_text: {n}Atilius hace una mueca y mueve los ojos de un lado a otro, inquieto.{/n} «Los enemigos de la Hum... es decir, el estimado Muaran y su comitiva no han despertado la alarma entre la población civil. No obstante, nos hemos visto obligados a invertir una cantidad prodigiosa de recursos en la reubicación de complejos agrícolas y almacenes para alejarlos de los supuestos "bosques sagrados del Lilaethan"».

languages.text: {n}Atilius zuckt zusammen, sein Blick irrt nervös umher.{/n} "Die neue Kolonie{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarGovern}führung{/d} hat einige ... unzulässige Dekrete erlassen. Wir mussten erhebliche Ressourcen aufwenden, um Agri-Komplexe und Lagerhäuser aus dem sogenannten 'Beschränkten Waldgebiet L-Than' zu verlegen. Überdies erreichen uns immer wieder mehr oder weniger unsinnige Denunziationen, die sich allesamt in einem Punkt ähneln: Sie bezichtigen Führungspersönlichkeiten, Kontakte zu ... fremden Elementen zu pflegen. Von Waldgeistern bis hin zu – der Imperator bewahre uns – Agenten der Xenos."
languages.original_text: {n}Atilius winces, his eyes nervously darting around.{/n} "The new colony {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarGovern}leadership{/d} issued a number of... irregular decrees. We have been obliged to spend prodigious amounts of resources to relocate agri-complexes and warehouses from the so-called 'L-Than Restricted Forest Area.' We also regularly receive denunciations of various degrees of nonsensicality, all of which share a common theme: they all accuse the people in charge of having ties to... foreign elements. From forest spirits to, Emperor preserve us, agents of xenos."

traits.locale_text: {n}Atilius zuckt zusammen, sein Blick irrt nervös umher.{/n} "Die Feinde der Men... will sagen, der geschätzte Muaran und sein Gefolge haben bei der Zivilbevölkerung keine größere Unruhe ausgelöst. Dennoch mussten wir erhebliche Ressourcen aufwenden, um Agri-Komplexe und Lagerhäuser aus den sogenannten 'heiligen Wäldern' von Lileath zu verlegen."

languages.text: {n}Atilius grimace et regarde nerveusement autour de lui.{/n} « La nouvelle {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarGovern}administration{/d} coloniale a promulgué un certain nombre de... décrets irréguliers. Nous avons été contraints de dépenser des quantités de ressources prodigieuses pour déplacer les agri-complexes et les entrepôts qui se trouvaient dans la "zone forestière réglementée L-Than". Par ailleurs, les autorités en place font régulièrement l'objet de dénonciations plus ou moins absurdes les accusant d'entretenir des liens avec des... éléments extérieurs allant des esprits de la forêt à, l'Empereur nous garde, des agents xénos. »
languages.original_text: {n}Atilius winces, his eyes nervously darting around.{/n} "The new colony {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarGovern}leadership{/d} issued a number of... irregular decrees. We have been obliged to spend prodigious amounts of resources to relocate agri-complexes and warehouses from the so-called 'L-Than Restricted Forest Area.' We also regularly receive denunciations of various degrees of nonsensicality, all of which share a common theme: they all accuse the people in charge of having ties to... foreign elements. From forest spirits to, Emperor preserve us, agents of xenos."

traits.locale_text: {n}Atilius grimace et regarde nerveusement autour de lui.{/n} « Les ennemis de l'hum... je veux dire, l'estimé Muaran et son entourage n'ont pas causé de troubles notables parmi les civils. Cependant, nous avons été contraints de dépenser des quantités de ressources prodigieuses pour déplacer les agri-complexes et les entrepôts qui se trouvaient dans les "forêts sacrées de la lilaethan". »

languages.text: {n}アティリウスは顔をしかめ、そわそわと目を泳がせる。{/n}「新しいコロニーの{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarGovern}リーダー{/d}の面々は、いくつも…常識外れな法令を発令しました。私達はやむなく膨大な量の資源を費やして、いわゆる『L-Than森林地帯制限区域』から農業設備や倉庫を移すことになったのです。さらに、程度に違いはあれど馬鹿げた告発も途切れることなく届いていて、全て同じ話題なんです。どれもこれも担当者を非難しています…外部のものと関係していると。森の精霊から、そして…ああ、皇帝よ、異種族の手先まで」
languages.original_text: {n}Atilius winces, his eyes nervously darting around.{/n} "The new colony {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarGovern}leadership{/d} issued a number of... irregular decrees. We have been obliged to spend prodigious amounts of resources to relocate agri-complexes and warehouses from the so-called 'L-Than Restricted Forest Area.' We also regularly receive denunciations of various degrees of nonsensicality, all of which share a common theme: they all accuse the people in charge of having ties to... foreign elements. From forest spirits to, Emperor preserve us, agents of xenos."

traits.locale_text: {n}アティリウスは顔をしかめ、そわそわと目を泳がせる。{/n}「新しいコロニーの{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarGovern}リーダー{/d}の面々は、いくつも…常識外れな法令を発令しました。私達はやむなく膨大な量の資源を費やして、いわゆる『L-Than森林地帯制限区域』から農業設備や倉庫を移すことになったのです。さらに、程度に違いはあれど馬鹿げた告発も途切れることなく届いていて、全て同じ話題なんです。どれもこれも担当者を非難しています…外部のものと関係していると。森の精霊から、そして…ああ、皇帝よ、異種族の手先まで」

languages.text: {n}Atilius yüzünü buruşturuyor ve sağa sola bakıyor.{/n} "Yeni koloni {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarGovern}iktidarı{/d} bir dizi... Nizama uymayan kararname çıkardı. Tarım kompleksleri ile depoları 'L-Than Yasaklı Orman Alanı' denilen yerden alıp başka bir yere taşımak için muazzam miktarda kaynak harcamak zorunda kaldık. Yetmezmiş gibi bir de iktidar sahiplerinin dış mihraklarla bağı olduğunu iddia eden ipe sapa gelmez dedikodular dolanıyor. İmparator korusun yok orman ruhları, yok zeno ajanları..."
languages.original_text: {n}Atilius winces, his eyes nervously darting around.{/n} "The new colony {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarGovern}leadership{/d} issued a number of... irregular decrees. We have been obliged to spend prodigious amounts of resources to relocate agri-complexes and warehouses from the so-called 'L-Than Restricted Forest Area.' We also regularly receive denunciations of various degrees of nonsensicality, all of which share a common theme: they all accuse the people in charge of having ties to... foreign elements. From forest spirits to, Emperor preserve us, agents of xenos."

traits.locale_text: {n}Atilius yüzünü buruşturuyor ve sağa sola bakıyor.{/n} "Yeni koloni iktidarı bir dizi... Nizama uymayan kararname çıkardı. Tarım kompleksleri ile depoları 'L-Than Yasaklı Orman Alanı' denilen yerden alıp başka bir yere taşımak için muazzam miktarda kaynak harcamak zorunda kaldık. Yetmezmiş gibi bir de iktidar sahiplerinin dış mihraklarla bağı olduğunu iddia eden ipe sapa gelmez dedikodular dolanıyor. İmparator korusun yok orman ruhları, yok zeno ajanları..."
